Class BoundaryGarden

  • java.lang.Object
    • BoundaryGarden

  • public class BoundaryGarden
extends java.lang.Object
    Set of boundaries + pre-computed values. The boundary set needs to be "gluing-closed" i.e; whenever a and b are in the garden and a glues onto b then a+b must also be in the garden.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int n
      number of boundarues

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BoundaryGarden(java.util.ArrayList<Boundary> boundaryList, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> boundaryNameList)
      Given a list of boundaries and a list of names, populates the boundary garden, then calculates; for each pair of boundaries, whether they can glue together using Boundary.canGlue(Boundary) calculates the result of gluing them together - crashes if this is not in garden calculates the list of valid inputs for each boundary creates a SignatureComputer for each pair

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoundaryGarden

        public BoundaryGarden(java.util.ArrayList<Boundary> boundaryList,
              java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> boundaryNameList)
        Given a list of boundaries and a list of names, populates the boundary garden, then calculates;
        • for each pair of boundaries, whether they can glue together using Boundary.canGlue(Boundary)
        • calculates the result of gluing them together - crashes if this is not in garden
        • calculates the list of valid inputs for each boundary
        • creates a SignatureComputer for each pair
        Parameters:
        boundaryList - list of boundaries
        boundaryNameList - list of names in same order
